items.sentence: Tom is ambidextrous and can use his right hand equally as well as his left.
I understand how much you want to go to the party, but I can\'t let you go.
I\'d like to introduce to you the gentleman I told you about the other day.
I\'ve been trying to call Tom, but I keep accidentally calling you instead.
I\'ve figured out that the only way I can do this is to get Tom to help me.
